author: Paul Maxim
content: No Kindle, Andreas, but I do have an iPad.  I haven't used it for reading books, but it is very useful (in my opinion) for reading and storing PDF's.  While traveling, for example, you can put a PDF of your camera's manual on the iPad and thereby avoid carrying the actual manual with you.  Mostly, though, I like the iPad for displaying photographs.  It's actually better than most laptops for color fidelity.
